SINGAPORE ( CBSNews ) -- President Trump arrived in Singapore on Sunday ( June 10 ) ahead of talks with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in one of the [ARGM-ADV: most highly] [V: anticipated] [ARG1: international summits] in recent memory . Mr.
